data.text:

Why Book A Personalised Celebrity Wish From Mohit Malhotra?

Unforgettable Surprises - By booking celebrity wishes, you'll create an unforgettable surprise for your loved one. The sheer joy and excitement they'll experience upon receiving a heartfelt wish from their favourite celebrity will make their day truly extraordinary.

Exclusive and Unique - Each wish will be crafted with care and tailored to suit your loved one's personality and the occasion. Whether it's a warm birthday greeting, a heartfelt anniversary wish, or a festive message, the celebrity will ensure it resonates with your loved one's heart.

Variety of Choices - From renowned actors and musicians to beloved sports stars and influencers, you can choose the celebrity who holds a special place in your loved one's heart. Select the perfect personality to make their wish truly remarkable.

Life Story

Mohit Malhotra began his journey to fame in 2009 when he participated in the reality show MTV Splitsvilla Season 2, where he was finished as the first runner-up. This marked the beginning of his career in the entertainment industry, leading to various substantial roles in television series.

Education

Mohit Malhotra pursued his higher education at the University of Delhi, New Delhi, where he completed his Bachelor of Business Management (BBM). Furthering his education, he took a specialized course in International Business at the University of California, Berkeley, California.

Birthdate

Mohit Malhotra was born on 4 April 1986.

Family

Mohit Malhotra is the son of Ashok Malhotra and Anju Malhotra. Mohit has an elder brother, Himanshu Malhotra, who is also an actor. His sister in law Amruta Khanvilkar, who is a very popular face in the marathi industry.

Age

As of 2024, Mohit Malhotra is 39 years old.

Height and Weight

Mohit Malhotra has a height of approximately 5 feet 11 inches and weight of approximately 80 kg

Career

Mohit Malhotra's career took off after his appearances on reality TV, leading to his acting debut in the TV serial Mitwa Phool Kamal Ke as Birju. His popularity when he portrayed Sid in the serial Sasural Genda Phool.

Filmography

Mohit made his cinematic debut in the psychological thriller Hacked in 2020, alongside TV co-star Hina Khan, showcasing his talents on the big screen

Television

Mohit made his television debut with MTV Splitsvilla Season 2 in 2009. Since then his television career is illustrious, having starred in Sasural Genda Phool, Bade Achhe Lagte Hain, Kya Hua Tera Vaada, and Naagin 5, among others.

Awards and Achievement

Mohit Malhotra won the Indian Telly Award for Best Fresh New Face (Male) in 2010.

Social Media

Mohit Malhotra's Instagram ID is @mohitmalhotra9 and he has a following of 531K followers.
